errors.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred on the server side. Please check the data and try again.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

general.unhandled: An error occurred. Please check all inputs and try again.

stores.invalidIdAndStatus: Status Id and status name are invalid.

connection.emptyData: API key data must not be empty.
connection.invalidRoles: User does not have all necessary roles.
connection.credentialsDoNotExist: Api credential details do not exist.
connection.testKeyChanged: Test api key has been changed.
connection.liveKeyChanged: Live api key has been changed.
connection.testMerchantIdChanged: Test merchant ID has been changed.
connection.liveMerchantIdChanged: Live merchant ID has been changed.
connection.companyLevelKey: We didn't recognize this API key on merchant level. Check that you have copied the API key on merchant level from your Adyen Customer Area.
connection.invalidKey: We didn't recognize this API key. Check that you have copied the API key for the right environment from your Adyen Customer Area.
connection.invalidMerchant: Merchant account is not connected to provided credentials.

payments.requiredFieldsError: Method id and code fields are required.
payments.notConfigured: Payment method with id %s is not configured
payments.failedToRetrieveMethodsAdyen: Failed to retrieve payment methods from Adyen.
payments.invalidCardConfig: The configuration of installments is invalid.

generalSettings.captureDelayError: Number of days must be between 1 and 7.
generalSettings.retentionPeriodError: Minimum number of retention period is 60.

webhooks.merchantError: Error occured: Merchant with ID %s is not found.
webhooks.failedToRegisterWebhook: Error occured: Unable to register webhooks on Adyen API. Make sure that storefront is publicly available, so Adyen webhooks can reach the store.
webhooks.hmacError: Error occured: Generating HMAC on Adyen API failed.

maintenance.title: Store maintenance mode has been detected
maintenance.description: Integration won't work while the store is in maintenance mode. Make sure that storefront is publicly available, so Adyen webhooks can reach the store.

validation.invalidEmail: This field must be a valid email.
validation.maxLength: The field cannot have more than %s characters.
validation.numeric: Value must be a valid number with max two decimals.
validation.nonNegative: Field cannot have a negative value.
validation.invalidNumberInList: Each value must be a positive number.
validation.invalidWholeNumberInList: Each value must be a positive whole number.
validation.duplicateNumberInList: The list cannot contain duplicate values.
validation.invalidUrl: Field must be a valid URL.
validation.invalidImageType: Provide a file in one of the supported image types (PNG, JPG, SVG).
validation.invalidImageSize: The provided file exceeds the limit of 10MB.

connection.title: Setup
connection.subtitle: Make sure you're logged in to the Adyen Customer Area. You will need top copy several settings from there to here. If you don't have an account yet, sign up.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Connect to the test environment to test your store's payments. When you're ready to process for real shoppers, connect to live.

apiKey.title: Merchant API key
apiKey.description: Copy the API key for the merchant account you want to connect. You can find this in the Adyen Customer Area.

merchant.title: Merchant account
merchant.description: Select which Adyen merchant account you want to connect to this store.

disconnectModal.title: Disconnect from Adyen?
disconnectModal.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect your shop from Adyen? This will remove all configured payment methods and settings, and shoppers will not be able to complete purchases on your shop.

changeEnvironmentModal.title: Change the environment?
changeEnvironmentModal.message: Are you sure you want to change the environment? This will remove all configured payment methods and settings on the current environment, and reconnect you to the newly selected environment.

errors.invalidApiKey: We didn't recognize this API key. Check that you have copied the API key for the right environment from your Adyen Customer Area.
errors.webhookValidationError: Webhook validation failed. Make sure that storefront is publicly available, so Adyen webhooks can reach the store.

messages.validCredentials: Your connection to Adyen was successful.
messages.connectionUpdated: Your connection details are updated and connection to Adyen was successful.

list.statusHint: Payment method status in Adyen Customer Area.
list.noMethodsForFilter: We couldn't find any payment methods matching the chosen criteria.

statuses.label: Status
statuses.selectPlaceholder: Select a status to filter by

active.title: Payment methods
active.description: This overview shows payment methods that are available for shoppers at this store's checkout.
active.noMethodsMessage: There are no Adyen payment methods configured to this store.

add.title: Add payment method
add.description: Choose a new payment method to be available in your store.
add.noMethodsMessage: There are no Adyen payment methods.

configure.title: Setup %s payment method
configure.description: Configure your preferences for this payment method. When you save your preferences, the payment method will be available on your store. Learn more

name.label: Payment method name
name.description: This is the name the shoppers will see on the checkout page.

description.label: Payment method description (optional)
description.description: This is the description the shoppers will see on the checkout page. You can show shoppers more information about this payment method.

surchargeType.label: Surcharge type
surchargeType.description: You can decide whether to add a surcharge when a shopper uses this payment method.

fixedSurcharge.label: Fixed surcharge
fixedSurcharge.description: Enter the specific amount to add to the order total when a shopper uses this payment method. Set the amount in default store currency.

percentSurcharge.label: Percent surcharge
percentSurcharge.description: Enter the percentage amount of the order total that is added to the total when a shopper uses this payment method.

paymentLink.label: Exclude for Pay By Link payments
paymentLink.description: Enable this if you do not want this payment method to be offered for Pay By Link.

tokenization.label: Enable tokenization
tokenization.description: During checkout, shoppers can choose to have their payment details stored in Adyen's highly secure platform. Adyen handles this process for its customers. Shoppers can then select the stored payment method during checkout.

tokenType.label: Token type
tokenType.description: Choose between CardOnFile(one-click), UnscheduledCardOnFile(non-fixed schedule MIT payments) or Subscription(fixed schedule MIT payments).
tokenType.error: This field is required if tokenization is enabled.

surchargeLimit.label: Surcharge limit
surchargeLimit.description: Enter the threshold for the total surcharge. This is the maximum surcharge that a shopper can be charged when using this payment method. Set the amount in default store currency.
surchargeLimit.error: Surcharge limit must be a positive number with maximum two decimals and greater or equal to the fixed surcharge.

logo.label: Upload payment method logo
logo.error: Provide a file in one of the supported image types (PNG, JPG, SVG).
logo.errorSize: The selected file exceeds the limit of 10MB.
logo.placeholder: Drop image or click here to upload

authorizationType.label: Authorization type
authorizationType.description: You can set payment requests to be handled as either a pre-authorization or a final authorization. In case of final authorization the amount is final and can not be modified. Pre-authorization allows you to adjust amount or extend expiry period and capture type is always manual.

showLogos.label: Show credit card logos
showLogos.description: You can decide whether to show shoppers credit card logos on the checkout.

singleClickPayment.label: Enable single click payments
singleClickPayment.description: Do you want shoppers to have the option to save their card details for future payments?

clickToPay.label: Enable Click to Pay
clickToPay.description: Do you want shoppers to have the option to use Click to Pay? Learn more

sendBasket.label: Enable L2/L3 data
sendBasket.description: Do you want to send additional data to shopper's card statements? This is useful for companies to track corporate card usage when a single card can have multiple users. Learn more

supportedInstallments.label: Supported installments
supportedInstallments.description: Do you want to allow shoppers to pay their bill in installments? Learn more

installments.label: Enable installments
installments.description: Do you want to allow shoppers to pay their bill in installments? Learn more

installmentAmounts.label: Show installment amounts
installmentAmounts.description: You can decide whether to show shoppers installment amounts on the checkout.

installmentCountries.label: Allowed installment countries
installmentCountries.description: You can decide for which countries installments should be offered to shoppers on the checkout.

minimumAmount.label: Minimum installment amount (optional)
minimumAmount.description: You can specify minimum order amount threshold for which installments should be offered to shoppers on the checkout.

numberOfInstallments.label: Number of installments
numberOfInstallments.description: Provide a comma-separated list of options representing the number of installments offered to shoppers on checkout. Learn more

showLogos.label: Show issuer logos
showLogos.description: You can decide whether to show shoppers bank issuer logos on the checkout.

bankIssuer.label: Bank issuer description (optional)
bankIssuer.description: This is a bank issuer dropdown description. The default description is 'Select your bank'

merchantId.label: Apple Pay merchant ID
merchantId.description: Enter identifier of the Apple Pay merchant.

merchantName.label: Apple Pay merchant name
merchantName.description: Enter name of the Apple Pay merchant.

displayButtonOn.label: Enable express checkout
displayButtonOn.description: Do you want to show Apple Pay Express Checkout on the product, cart, and checkout pages?

publicKeyId.label: Amazon Pay public key ID
publicKeyId.description: Enter identifier of the Amazon Pay public key.

merchantId.label: Amazon Pay merchant ID
merchantId.description: Enter identifier of the Amazon Pay merchant.

displayButtonOn.label: Enable express checkout
displayButtonOn.description: Do you want to show Amazon Pay Express Checkout on the product, cart, and checkout pages?

gatewayMerchantId.label: Google Pay merchant gateway ID
gatewayMerchantId.description: Enter identifier of the Google Pay merchant gateway.

merchantId.label: Google Pay merchant ID
merchantId.description: Enter identifier of the Google Pay merchant.

displayButtonOn.label: Enable express checkout
displayButtonOn.description: Do you want to show Google Pay Express Checkout on the product, cart, and checkout pages?

displayButtonOn.label: Enable express checkout
displayButtonOn.description: Do you want to show PayPal Express Checkout on the product, cart, and checkout pages?

delete.title: Remove payment method
delete.description: Do you want to remove this payment method from your store? Shoppers will no longer be able to pay with this payment method.

switchToStore.title: Unsaved changes
switchToStore.description: Changes you made are not saved. Are you sure that you want to proceed with switching to another store?

general.title: General settings
general.description: These settings are applicable globally and will be implemented across all payment methods.

basketItemSync.label: Send basket data
basketItemSync.description: Sending basket data as additional risk fields makes it easier to detect fraud and can be used for custom risk rules. Do you want to send this data to Adyen?

capture.label: Capture
capture.description: Some payment methods support separate authorisation and capture. By default, capture is set to immediately after authorisation, but you can choose to delay the capture for these payment methods. This can be helpful if you want to have the option to cancel a payment in case of issues with shipment, for example.

captureDelay.label: Capture delay
captureDelay.description: How many days after authorisation do you want the payment to be captured? Enter a number from 1 to 7.
captureDelay.error: Number of days must be between 1 and 7.

shipmentStatus.label: Capture on status change
shipmentStatus.description: Select the status that will trigger the payment capture.

retentionPeriod.label: Notifications retention period
retentionPeriod.description: Define number of days that notification logs will be stored in the system.
retentionPeriod.error: Minimum number of the retention period is 60 days.

enablePayByLink.label: Enable Pay By Link
enablePayByLink.description: With our Pay By Link feature you can send a payment to your customers if they do not complete the payment on Adyen during checkout process or if you wish to create an order for a customer through the shop back-office and then send a payment link to the customer.

payByLinkTitle.label: Pay by link title
payByLinkTitle.description: Define the name of the Pay By Link payment method in shop back-office.
payByLinkTitle.error: Pay by link title can not be empty.

defaultLinkExpirationTime.label: Default expiration time
defaultLinkExpirationTime.description: Define the default expiration time in days.
defaultLinkExpirationTime.error: Minimum number of default expiration time in days is 1.

orderStatusMapping.title: Order status mapping
orderStatusMapping.description: This page allows you to map shop order statuses to Adyen payment statuses.

inProgress.label: In progress
inProgress.description: The Adyen payment status In progress. This status is assigned when an order is initially created during the checkout process. Should represent the following shop status:

paid.label: Paid
paid.description: The Adyen payment status Paid. This status is assigned when an order is authorised on Adyen. Should represent the following shop status:

failed.label: Failed
failed.description: The Adyen payment status Failed should represent the following shop status:

refunded.label: Refunded
refunded.description: The Adyen payment status Refunded should represent the following shop status:

cancelled.label: Cancelled
cancelled.description: The Adyen payment status Cancelled should represent the following shop status:

partiallyRefunded.label: Partially refunded
partiallyRefunded.description: The Adyen payment status Partially refunded should represent the following shop status:

chargeBack.label: Charge back
chargeBack.description: The Adyen payment status Charge back should represent the following shop status:

adyenGiving.title: Adyen giving
adyenGiving.description: With Adyen Giving, your shoppers can have the option to donate to a charity of your choice during checkout. Make sure you have an Adyen merchant account set up for Adyen Giving, or contact your Adyen Account Manager or Support. Learn more

enableAdyenGiving.label: Enable Adyen Giving
enableAdyenGiving.description: You need a charity account to enable Adyen Giving. Do you want to enable Adyen Giving?

charityName.label: Charity name
charityName.description: Enter the name of the charity. This will be shown to shoppers on the donation page.

charityDescription.label: Charity description
charityDescription.description: Enter a short description of the charity to show to shoppers on the donation page.

charityMerchantAccount.label: Charity merchant account
charityMerchantAccount.description: Enter your Adyen merchant account name for charity.

donationAmount.label: Donation Amounts
donationAmount.description: Enter suggested donation amounts for shoppers to choose from. Use comma-separated values in your default store currency. Example: 2, 3, 5, 10

charityWebsite.label: Charity website
charityWebsite.description: Enter the link to the charity website.

logo.label: Logo in Adyen Giving component
logo.placeholder: Drop image or click here to upload

backgroundImage.label: Background image for Adyen Giving component
backgroundImage.placeholder: Drop image or click here to upload

system.title: System information and troubleshooting
system.description: This page comprehensively details the integration's current configuration, system status, and diagnostic information.

debugMode.label: Debug mode
debugMode.description: Enable debug log level for Adyen payment requests.

adyenWebhooksValidation.label: Adyen webhooks validation
adyenWebhooksValidation.description: Validate whether webhooks are received from Adyen to your store.

integrationConfigurationValidation.label: Integration configuration validation
integrationConfigurationValidation.description: Performs validation if background tasks are executed in your store.

downloadSystemInformation.label: Download system information
downloadSystemInformation.description: Download the system information report so that you can pass it to Adyen support for easier and faster troubleshooting of the issue.

contactAdyenSupport.label: Contact Adyen support
contactAdyenSupport.description: If you need help troubleshooting the issue, please feel free to contact our support.

messages.failedWebhookValidation: Store was not able to receive webhook from Adyen
messages.downloadReportText: Download the full report here.

shop.title: Shop event notifications
shop.description: This page displays any important store events that were not able to be synced with Adyen.

event.successfulPaymentAuthorizationEventDetai: Payment has been authorized by Adyen.
event.successfulCancellationEventMessage: Payment has been cancelled on Adyen.
event.successfulCancellationEventDetails: Payment has been cancelled on Adyen.
event.successfulCancellationRequestEventMessag: Cancellation request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulCancellationRequestEventDetail: Cancellation request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulCaptureEventMessage: Payment has been captured successfully on Adyen.
event.successfulCaptureEventDetails: Payment has been captured successfully on Adyen.
event.successfulCaptureRequestEventMessage: Capture request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulCaptureRequestEventDetails: Capture request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulRefundEventMessage: Payment has been refunded successfully on Adyen.
event.successfulRefundEventDetails: Payment has been refunded successfully on Adyen.
event.successfulRefundRequestEventMessage: Refund request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulRefundRequestEventDetails: Refund request has been sent to Adyen.
event.successfulAuthorizationAdjustmentEventMe: Payment has been successfully adjusted on Adyen.
event.successfulAuthorizationAdjustmentEventDe: Payment has been successfully adjusted on Adyen.
event.successfulAuthorizationAdjustmentRequest: Authorization adjustment request has been sent successfully to Adyen.
Authorization adjustment request has been sent successfully to Adyen.

webhook.title: Webhook notifications
webhook.description: This log shows all notifications for Adyen webhooks that have been received.

notificationDetailsModal.title: Notification details
notificationDetailsModal.paymentLink: Go to payment in Adyen CA
